text:
DiffBlue | Java developer | Oxford, UK | ONSITE https://diffblue.breezy.hr/p/f4cc6cc1dfde

We develop techniques that use artificial intelligence to improve our customers' code. To make our analysis efficient, we need to have an implementation of commonly used libraries that is optimised so that our tools can easily understand it. We are looking for Java developers to help us in this effort. See the link above for more details.
